propertyDefinition.name: IrradiationTimeCounter
propertyDefinition.description: Irradiation time

propertyDefinition.name: LayerIrradiationTimeCounter
propertyDefinition.description: Layer irradiation time

propertyDefinition.name: MaxIrradiationTime
propertyDefinition.description: Max irradiation time

propertyDefinition.name: LayerMaxIrradiationTime
propertyDefinition.description: Layer max irradiation time

propertyDefinition.name: PrimaryDoseToDeliver
propertyDefinition.description: Primary dose to be delivered [MU]

propertyDefinition.name: SecondaryDoseToDeliver
propertyDefinition.description: Secondary dose to be delivered [MU]

propertyDefinition.name: PrimaryDeliveredDose
propertyDefinition.description: Primary dose delivered [MU]

propertyDefinition.name: SecondaryDeliveredDose
propertyDefinition.description: Secondary dose delivered [MU]

propertyDefinition.name: BeamDetected
propertyDefinition.description: Indicates if beam is detected on ICs

propertyDefinition.name: LayerIndex
propertyDefinition.description: Index of the current layer (starts at 0 for first layer)

propertyDefinition.name: NrOfLayers
propertyDefinition.description: Number of layers in the current irradiation session

propertyDefinition.name: RepaintingType
propertyDefinition.description: The type of repainting in the current irradiation session

propertyDefinition.name: PrimaryDoseToDeliverForLayer
propertyDefinition.description: Primary dose to be delivered for the current layer

propertyDefinition.name: SecondaryDoseToDeliverForLayer
propertyDefinition.description: Secondary dose to be delivered for the current layer

propertyDefinition.name: PrimaryDeliveredDoseForLayer
propertyDefinition.description: Primary dose delivered for the current layer

propertyDefinition.name: SecondaryDeliveredDoseForLayer
propertyDefinition.description: Secondary dose delivered for the current layer

propertyDefinition.name: RangeInPatient
propertyDefinition.description: Range in patient

propertyDefinition.name: IrradiationStatus
propertyDefinition.description: Status of the current irradiation session

propertyDefinition.name: TreatmentTerminationStatus
propertyDefinition.description: States why/how a treatment terminated

propertyDefinition.name: TreatmentRoomSession
propertyDefinition.description: States the type of TR session

propertyDefinition.name: TreatmentMode
propertyDefinition.description: Treatment mode of the current irradiation session

propertyDefinition.name: StartAllowed
propertyDefinition.description: true if start can be called

propertyDefinition.name: StopAllowed
propertyDefinition.description: true if stop can be called

propertyDefinition.name: PauseAtIrradiationEnd
propertyDefinition.description: true if pause is to be called at end of irradiation

propertyDefinition.name: DisplayPopups
propertyDefinition.description: true if you want to show popups

propertyDefinition.name: PauseAllowed
propertyDefinition.description: true if pause can be called

propertyDefinition.name: ElementId
propertyDefinition.description: ID of the current Element for PBS irradiation

propertyDefinition.name: NrOfElements
propertyDefinition.description: Number of elements for PBS irradiation

propertyDefinition.name: PauseBetweenLayers
propertyDefinition.description: true if option 'pause between layers' is selected

propertyDefinition.name: PauseBetweenTuning
propertyDefinition.description: true if option 'pause between tuning' is selected

propertyDefinition.name: RepeatTuning
propertyDefinition.description: true if option 'repeat tuning' is selected

propertyDefinition.name: TuningRequired
propertyDefinition.description: true if option 'tuning required' is selected

propertyDefinition.name: aliveTime
propertyDefinition.description: Indicates the last time the component was alive.
